author: ad it up

review: Have only made use of the movie capabilities of this gadget, but can say I am definitely impressed with the Fire stick.  I'm on Amazon daily, so can't say the media exposure has been adequate.  And I still wouldn't own one, had I not been given this one, but for a person who hates holding a laptop to watch a movie, this is truly meeting a need.  My hands are in constant arthritis pain and even a cell phone is difficult for me to hold for very long. With minimal difficulty, I was able to hook it up correctly, and was watching a movie within a half hour.  My only unanswered question is, "Can all Prime movies be accessed with these gadgets, or just the ones posted on the home screen?"  I wouldappreciate anyone's response.  The best part is the price.  So very, very affordable.  Great going, Amazon!
author: Coni G.
